page.title: 18Biography
page.content: Mr.Robert Williams or Bob Bardsey is an old Holyhead fisherman.He was born in one of the lifeboat cottages on Salt Island in 1901.He is one of alarge family so as a young man he went on trial trips on the lifeboat to earn some money. He was a member of the lifeboat crew that rescued 47 crew members of the S.S.Castillion on March 3rd 1943. His father had also been a member of the lifeboat crew for 45 years and had helped to save over 500 lives. Today Robert Williams mends nets for the local fishing fleet. He begins to work at 6am and finishes at 6am.
